preface.title: Welcome to the BLFS Editor's Manual
preface.para: This guide is designed to be a friendly introduction to BLFS editing.

This document covers a few things. First, basic administrative issues like accessing Subversion over SSH, committing changes, and BLFS logging policy are covered. Then we briefly discuss a little bit of general BLFS policy.
This document is intended to be helpful not only to all of the (co)editors but also to anyone thinking about contributing to BLFS.
